heisig_chinese_memo: The overseer makes sure he keeps a good view of the underling so he can see his activities at all times. &nbsp
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When I'm about to see a beautiful view I get super excited it.  It never gets old.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " seeing ", from " monitoring ", " monitoring " also sounds. The original meaning is to watch. "Shu Wen": "Looking, watching. From seeing the supervision, supervision is also sound." Such as "Chu Ci. Lament ":" view that Joze Xi Lan pepper, and exposing condition river from the car. "" View "represents more than condescending or climb mountains, such as" Records of the Historian. "The Book of the First Emperor of Qin": "(Shihuang) personally patrolled the distant Limin, Dengzitai Mountain, and viewed the East Pole." Du Fu of the Tang Dynasty <Wangyue>: "Hui will be the top of the mountain, looking at the small mountains."

" View " means to watch and display. Duan Yucai's "Shuowen Jiezi Annotation": "I can view things by me, and I can view things by extension." Such as "Chu Ci. Chapter Nine. "Thinking": "Hold me with its beauty, and when you look at it, you can repair it." Zhu Xi's collection of notes: "Look, show also." "Historical Records. "The Biography of Mencius Xunqing": "Looking at the guests of the princes of the world, the same words can make the world's wise men."

" View " means reading and reading. Such as "Han Feizi. "Foreign Chu said on the upper left": "The talks in this world are all eloquent words. People who read the words and forget their usefulness." "Wang Chong Wang Fu Zhong Chang Tong Biography": "(Wang Chong) good expo but not keeping chapters and sentences."

" Look " also means acceptance and acceptance. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Qi Ceyi": "The king reads what he said, but does not check the truth." Gao You's note: "Look, accept." "Han Shu. "Wei Xian Biography": "Look up and follow the discussion."

" Browse " said handheld, grasp, made after " football ." Such as "Latent Theory. "Three Forms": "This is in harmony with the main morality, the lord is great, not the executive supervising, the overview is arbitrarily under the control." Wang Jipei's Jian: "Look at the province." For example, in the Tang Dynasty, Li Bai "Xuanzhou Xie Tiao Lou's Farewell School Book Shu Yun": "All I want to see is the blue sky and the bright moon."
humanum_short_description_en: From " seeing ", from " monitoring ", " monitoring " also sounds. The original meaning is to watch.
humanum_full_description:
從「見」，從「監」，「監」亦聲。本義是觀看。《說文》：「覽，觀也。从見監，監亦聲。」如《楚辭．離騷》：「覽椒蘭其若茲兮，又況揭車與江離。」「覽」多表示居高臨下或登高遠眺，如《史記．秦始皇本紀》：「（始皇）親巡遠方黎民，登茲泰山，周覽東極。」唐代杜甫〈望嶽〉：「會當凌絕頂，一覽眾山小。」

　　「覽」引申表示使觀看、展示。段玉裁《說文解字注》：「以我觀物曰覽，引伸之使物觀我亦曰覽。」如《楚辭．九章．抽思》：「憍吾以其美好兮，覽余以其脩姱。」 朱熹集注：「覽，示也。」《史記．孟子荀卿列傳》：「覽天下諸侯賓客，言齊能致天下賢士也。」

　　「覽」表示閱讀、閱覽。如《韓非子．外儲說左上》：「今世之談也，皆道辯說文辭之言，人主覽其文而忘有用。」《後漢書．王充王符仲長統列傳》：「（王充）好博覽而不守章句。」

　　「覽」又表示采納、接受。如《戰國策．齊策一》：「大王覽其說，而不察其至實。」高誘注：「覽，受。」 《漢書．韋賢傳》：「上覽其議而從之。」

　　「覽」還表示手持、把握，後作「攬」。如《潛夫論．三式》：「此於主德大洽，列侯大達，非執術督責，總覽獨斷御下方也。」汪繼培箋：「覽即攬之省。」又引申指采摘。如唐代李白〈宣州謝朓樓餞別校書叔雲〉：「俱懷逸興壯思飛，欲上青天覽明月。」
humanum_short_description: 從「見」，從「監」，「監」亦聲。本義是觀看，多表示居高臨下或登高遠眺。

從「 見 」，從「 監 」，「 監 」亦聲。本義是觀看。《說文》：「覽，觀也。从見監，監亦聲。」如《楚辭．離騷》：「覽椒蘭其若茲兮，又況揭車與江離。」「 覽 」多表示居高臨下或登高遠眺，如《史記．秦始皇本紀》：「（始皇）親巡遠方黎民，登茲泰山，周覽東極。」唐代杜甫〈望嶽〉：「會當凌絕頂，一覽眾山小。」 「 覽 」引申表示使觀看、展示。段玉裁《說文解字注》：「以我觀物曰覽，引伸之使物觀我亦曰覽。」如《楚辭．九章．抽思》：「憍吾以其美好兮，覽余以其脩姱。」 朱熹集注：「覽，示也。」《史記．孟子荀卿列傳》：「覽天下諸侯賓客，言齊能致天下賢士也。」 「 覽 」表示閱讀、閱覽。如《韓非子．外儲說左上》：「今世之談也，皆道辯說文辭之言，人主覽其文而忘有用。」《後漢書．王充王符仲長統列傳》：「（王充）好博覽而不守章句。」 「 覽 」又表示采納、接受。如《戰國策．齊策一》：「大王覽其說，而不察其至實。」高誘注：「覽，受。」 《漢書．韋賢傳》：「上覽其議而從之。」 「 覽 」還表示手持、把握，後作「 攬 」。如《潛夫論．三式》：「此於主德大洽，列侯大達，非執術督責，總覽獨斷御下方也。」汪繼培箋：「覽即攬之省。」又引申指采摘。如唐代李白〈宣州謝朓樓餞別校書叔雲〉：「俱懷逸興壯思飛，欲上青天覽明月。」

覽字的基本解释

覽
lǎn
见“览”。

覽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǎn］
［《廣韻》盧敢切，上敢，來。］
亦作“覧1”。
(1)观看；考察。
(2)炫示。
(3)阅读。
(4)登高远眺。
(5)引申为视线。
(6)游览，游历。
(7)景致。
(8)通“攬”。采纳，接受。
(9)通“攬”。持，把握。
(10)通“攬”。采摘。
[②]［làn］
［《字彙補》郎紺切］
唐代南诏副将官职名。

覽字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　覽； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1138第03
【唐韻】盧敢切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】魯敢切，?藍上聲。【說文】觀也。【孔安國·尚書序】覩史籍之煩文，懼覽之者不一。【史記·秦始皇紀】登兹泰山，周覽東極。　又州名。【唐書·地理志】劒南道有覽州，貞觀二十三年置。　又姓。【姓苑】望出彭城。　又【韻會】通作攬。【王羲之·蘭亭敘】後之攬者，亦將有感於斯文。【正字通】按攬覽音同義別。攬，撮取也。溷同覽，非。　又【韻會】【正韻】?盧瞰切，藍去聲。【前漢·韋孟·諷諫詩】我王如何，曾不斯覽。叶下鑒，師古讀。　又官名。【唐書·南蠻傳】南詔，各府副將曰演覽、繕覽、澹覽、幕覽。【唐書·音義】讀。　【俗書證誤】从亽作覧，非。

覽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
覽字的起名意思

暂无。

View
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǎn］
["Guangyun" Lu Gan cut, go up, come. ]
Also known as "覧1".
(1) Watch; investigate.
(2) Show off.
(3) Reading.
(4) Climb high and look into the distance.
(5) Extended to sight.
(6) Tour, travel.
(7) Scenery.
(8) Through "Lun". Adopt, accept.
(9) Through "Landing". Hold, hold.
(10) "Let" through. pick.
[②]［làn］
[Lang Jingqie in "Zihuibu"]
The name of the deputy general of Nanzhao in the Tang Dynasty.
View

[Kong Anguo·Shangshu Preface] The annoying texts in the history books are different for those who fear to read them. 【Historical Records·Qin Shi Huang Ji】Dengzitai Mountain, Zhou view the East Pole.　Also the name of the state. 【Book of Tang·Geography】Lanzhou is located on South Road, and it was set up in Zhenguan for 23 years.　Another last name. [Surname Garden] Looking out of Pengcheng.　 [Rhyme Club] is all about it. [Wang Xizhi·Lantingxu] Those who take it afterwards will also feel gentle. [Zhengzitong] Synonymous with Lanlanyin. Collect, extract also. Not at the same time.　[Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun]? Lu Kanqie, Lan Qusheng. [Previous Han Wei Meng • Satirical Poems] How about my king, Zeng Busi Lan. Ye Xiajian, teacher of ancient reading.　Also official name.
